title: First BaT Event of the Year: Arizona Car Week, January 25 with OTTO Car Club
description: BaT is coming to Arizona Car Week! Sign up and bring your car out to the first BaT event of the year, which we are holding on January 25 from 7-11am as part of the infamous B&BS show at the beautiful Scottsdale facility of OTTO Car Club (a BaT Local Partner).
author: bringatrailer
excerpt: Learn more about First BaT Event of the Year: Arizona Car Week, January 25 with OTTO Car Club on Bring a Trailer, the home of the best vintage and classic cars online.
text: BaT is coming to Arizona Car Week! Sign up and bring your car out to the first BaT event of the year, which we are holding on January 25 from 7-11am as part of the infamous B&BS show at the beautiful Scottsdale facility of OTTO Car Club (a BaT Local Partner). Attendance is free for all, so we encourage you to bring your BaT purchase or other special car out to the show (or simply bring yourself, friends, and/or family). Parking for show cars is on a first-come, first-served basis on 78th Street and in several adjacent parking lots, which have all been reserved for the event. We will accommodate as many of you as we can! Spectator parking can be had on surrounding neighborhood streets. Coffee and bagels will be available, and we’ve got some fun stuff to give away at the BaT tent. Several pop-up displays will include fellow BaT Local Partner 911r as well as Adam’s Polishes and an AI glasses experience from Meta Labs. Will you be attending? RSVP to let us know – we can’t wait to see you there! Event details: Saturday, January 25 from 7am – 11am OTTO Car Club – a BaT Local Partner 15550 North 78th Street Scottsdale, AZ 85260
html:
BaT is coming to Arizona Car Week! Sign up and bring your car out to the first BaT event of the year, which we are holding on January 25 from 7-11am as part of the infamous B&BS show at the beautiful Scottsdale facility of OTTO Car Club (a BaT Local Partner).

Attendance is free for all, so we encourage you to bring your BaT purchase or other special car out to the show (or simply bring yourself, friends, and/or family). Parking for show cars is on a first-come, first-served basis on 78th Street and in several adjacent parking lots, which have all been reserved for the event. We will accommodate as many of you as we can! Spectator parking can be had on surrounding neighborhood streets.

Coffee and bagels will be available, and we’ve got some fun stuff to give away at the BaT tent. Several pop-up displays will include fellow BaT Local Partner 911r as well as Adam’s Polishes and an AI glasses experience from Meta Labs.

Will you be attending? RSVP to let us know – we can’t wait to see you there!

Event details:

Saturday, January 25 from 7am – 11am
OTTO Car Club – a BaT Local Partner
15550 North 78th Street Scottsdale, AZ 85260
